animal.question: I say 'Moo!' and I give you milk. Who am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have black and white spots

animal.question: I have a long tail and I love to chase mice. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐈‍⬛ I purr when you pet me
🧶 I like to play with yarn

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I like to eat pond plants

animal.question: I say 'Woof! Woof!' and I love to play fetch. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones
🐾 I wag my tail when I'm happy

animal.question: I hop and eat carrots. Who am I?
I roar and I am the king of the jungle. Who am I?
I have a long trunk and big ears. Who am I?

hints.text: 🚿 I use my trunk to spray water

animal.question: I have black and white stripes. Who am I?
I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I eat from the tallest trees

animal.question: I swing from trees and love to eat bananas. Who am I?

cosmos.question: I'm big and bright, I shine in the day. I keep you warm when you want to play! What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I'm up when you wake up in the morning.

cosmos.question: I'm round and white, I shine at night. Sometimes I'm big, sometimes I'm small! What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 People sometimes say I'm made of cheese.
🌚 I reflect light from the Sun.

cosmos.question: I twinkle and shine, so far away. I'm in the sky, but mostly at night! What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I am part of a galaxy.

cosmos.question: I am big and round, and you live on me. I have land and water, for all to see! What am I?

hints.text: 🌎 I have lots of trees and animals.

cosmos.question: I'm a hot ball of gas, much bigger than the Earth. I give light, but I'm not the Sun! What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I’m also made of gas, extremely hot.
☀️ I am similar to the sun, but further away.

cosmos.question: I'm a group of stars that make a picture. You can see me at night if you look carefully! What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Sometimes I look like an animal.
✨ I’m not just one star, but lots of them together.
🎨 People long ago gave me names.

cosmos.question: I go around the Sun, I'm big and cold. I have rings around me, made of ice and rock so I'm told! What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rock!
💨 I am mostly made of gas.

cosmos.question: I'm the red planet, dusty and dry. Maybe one day, people will fly to me in the sky! What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 My surface has a lot of rust, which makes it look red.
🚀 People are planning to visit me soon.

cosmos.question: I'm a big, cold planet, far, far away. I'm blue in color, what planet could I be today? What am I?

hints.text: 🔵 I'm a very pretty color, like the ocean.

cosmos.question: I’m a place with many stars, dust, and gas. Our sun lives here, can you guess what I am at last?

hints.text: 🌌 My name sounds like something yummy to drink but spelled differently.
